tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
"Dr. Aditya Tiwari is a dentist I wholeheartedly recommend to anyone looking for great care. I had a number of major procedures done under his skilled supervision, including three tooth extractions, five root canals, and seven deep fillings. The outcomes are fantastic.

I was struck by Dr. Tiwari's team's warmth and professionalism as soon as I entered his office. Every time I went, they made me feel welcome and well-cared for. Being the epitome of professionalism, Dr. Tiwari always took the time to thoroughly explain each procedure, making sure I understood it and felt comfortable.

The precision with which he carried out each extraction, root canal, and filling speaks volumes about his skill and knowledge. I had very little discomfort during the complicated treatments because of Dr. Tiwari's careful attention to detail and kind demeanor. The results have greatly improved my teeth's appearance and function, surpassing my expectations.

Dr. Aditya Tiwari is the ideal option if you're looking for a dentist who combines technical skill with true compassion for his patients. I express my gratitude to Dr. Tiwari and your committed team for delivering exceptional healthcare."
reply_text:
Thank you Devesh
Hope you are doing well

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I recently had my root canal surgery here, Mr Aditya & his team made my entire procedure very comfortable and easy. Being my first RCT, I was very anxious, but doctor was very patient with me and made it as comfortable for me as possible. Extremely satisfied with the entire procedure.
reply_text: Thank you ma'am for a lovely review üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: When I sustained dental injuries while playing cricket, I initially felt uncertain about the prospects of recovery. However, under the expert care of Dr. Aditya, I underwent necessary root canal treatments that resulted in a permanent solution. Despite my initial concerns about the potential discomfort associated with dental procedures, Dr. Aditya and his team handled the process with exceptional skill and efficiency. Within a span of two weeks, my dental issues were completely resolved. The professionalism, support, and consistent communication from the entire team were truly commendable. I extend my sincere gratitude to everyone involved for their outstanding care.
reply_text:
Thank you Mr Ray. 
Hope you are doing well.

tags: Wait time,
review:
The root canal treatment was carried out with great precision, and I experienced minimal discomfort throughout the process. Your attention to detail and clear communication made the entire experience much less daunting than I had anticipated.

Additionally, the bridge placement was executed flawlessly. The fit and appearance are perfect, and it feels completely natural. I am extremely pleased with the outcome and appreciate the effort you and your team put into ensuring everything was done to the highest standard.

Thank you once again for your exceptional service. 
Pranjal Borthakur

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
He is very rude and doesn‚Äôt know how to speak to a lady
I have never seen a dentist with so much of attitude .
reply_text:
Thank you for your feedback. At Tooth and Braces, we value all our patients and take their concerns seriously.

You visited us with a severe infection in the wisdom tooth region, accompanied by noticeable facial swelling. We prescribed antibiotics and advised tooth removal. The antibiotics given were standard and necessary for your condition. It's important to understand that these medications need time to work, Patience is key for the medicines to take effect. We are doctors not magicians

Regarding your comment on my attitude and rude behaviour, I want to clarify that I do not enjoy being rude or stern with any patient. However, your behavior towards our staff was completely unacceptable. At Tooth and Braces, the respect and dignity of our staff are of utmost importance. We rely on our dedicated team to provide the best care possible. The way you spoke to our staff in the clinic and during subsequent phone call was highly inappropriate.

We wish we could share the call recordings of the conversations to provide context and clarity on the matter and to prove how the way you spoke was unacceptable. we wish there was a way to review verified patients just like they review us. Despite the challenges, we sincerely wish you good health and hope you find a dentist whose attitude meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Tooth and Braces

review:
I visited Dr Aditya Tiwary for root canal treatment and I was amazed by the treatment i received it was so smooth and painless. Dr Aditya and Dr Pooja are very friendly and adjusting. 
They made sure I was at comfort and provided me with the best treatment. 
Also the clinic is so well maintained and clean. I would give a full 10/10 for hygiene and cleanliness. 
I would highly recommend Dr Aditya for any kind of dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was an absolute delight to receive treatment at tooth and braces. Both the doctors patiently explained the issue and proposed treatment. During the first check up, I had been provided guidance by Dr. Tiwary. The procedures were executed by both Dr. Tiwary and Dr. Mehta. Proper briefing had been provided by the doctors to each other and the work was done seemlessly. Dr. Mehta carried out the dental fillings in a flawless manner and made sure that I was comfortable throughout. She also paid attention to even small reactions and made sure to put me at ease even when there was the slightest discomfort. Dr. Tiwary treated the sensitivity issue and made sure that I was comfortable both during and after the procedure. He also explained the post treatment care in detail. The procedures were executed with great care and precision. The facility is hygienically maintained and utmost degree of professional standards. The staff was well trained.
reply_text:
Thank you so much for the lovely review

Regards
Tooth and Braces
